short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Timer provides a simple and intuitive way to allocate your time wisely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Simple Timer is more than just a timer; it's a minimalist work of art that elegantly enhances your productivity without any pesky bugs to interrupt your flow. Designed with your visual comfort in mind, its eye-pleasing interface soothes as it counts down, ensuring you stay on track with tasks while enjoying the experience. Embrace the elegance of simplicity and elevate your work routine with the Simple Timer..
